meanings.definition: A value on a coordinate axis.
meanings.sent1: The ordinates on the graph represent the vertical values.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to label the ordinates accurately on the chart.
meanings.sent3: The ordinates decided to throw a party for the abscissas.
meanings.sent4: The ordinates stood tall like skyscrapers in the city of coordinates.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful stickers to mark the ordinates on the graph.

meanings.definition: A point on a coordinate axis.
meanings.sent1: The ordinates show where the points are located vertically.
meanings.sent2: Plot the ordinates carefully to create the correct shape.
meanings.sent3: The ordinates gathered at the intersection for a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The ordinates danced gracefully along the y-axis.
meanings.sent5: The bright stars in the sky resembled the ordinates on the graph.
